items.name: Teeny weenie balance bike
items.longDescription: James is 1 and a half around Christmas - and it'd be good if it was a size he could use immediately or in the next month or two.

items.name: Thicker foam/rubber play mat
items.longDescription: James has some cool indoor climbing frames. We want him to bounce a bit when the inevitable misshaps happen.

items.name: Kids food preparation knives
items.longDescription: Really we want James to do all the cooking from the age of 2, so he needs to start now

items.name: BT6000 Video Baby Monitor
items.shortDescription: James would like this so his parents are extra good at checking on him.
items.longDescription: Ideally we'd get several monitors with monitor-chargers, so we can monitor him from different parts of the house.

items.name: Animal photo posters for his room
items.shortDescription: James loves dogs and ducks - common often seen animals would be welcome
items.longDescription: Please no detailed posters about duckbilled platypuses or komodo dragons til he's older, and no abstract illustrations. Unsubtle is good.

items.name: Number floor tiles/mats
items.shortDescription: We want to start recognising number shapes soon
items.longDescription: We have lots of alphabet things - and are keen for some number ones.

items.name: Warm boots (Size 4-4.5)
items.shortDescription: So he has warm feet this winter.
items.longDescription: He's size Size 4-4.5. We're looking for cosy warm boots - not wellies, but cosy bootlets for chilly toes.

items.name: Edelrid Fraggle XXS Climbing harness
items.longDescription: It's entirely possible that James won't fit into this for some months, but he'd like it so he can one day go near heights in caves and near cliffs.

items.name: Small buoyancy aid for swimming
items.longDescription: It's entirely possible that James use this for a while, but he'd like it so he can one day go near water and on boats.

items.name: Oranges
items.longDescription: James loves clementines and satsumas and can get into them by himself. He would love gifts of orange!

items.name: Flyaway footballs
items.longDescription: Balls of all sizes likely be enthusiastically hugged, and potentially attempts will be made to eat them.

notes.checkFirst: Feel free to check with Tim and Jen if you have questions.
